        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="76125" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="76125" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.04</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="305">305</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="25"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Highgrove Bouquet</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Highgrove Bouquet</b> was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Julie Pluchet. Top note is Lime (Linden) Blossom; middle note is Mimosa; base note is Cedar. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>In Summer, Highgrove Gardens hum with a smell often described as earthly sunshine. The grass bows to weeping silver lime, mimosa, and cedar. The eau de parfum was created with then HRH The Prince of Wales.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a Such an elegant but up to date floral perfume! The combination between the linden &amp; mimosa is magnificent! This fragrance creates a beautiful aura,I feel super pretty and happy wearing this ! Spectacular!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2220783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2220783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198851" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Xeryus-861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Xeryus"title="Xeryus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716">Glyph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 03:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has been one of the finest among the surprising spate of new linden fragrances that have appeared lately, and, with its addition of mimosa, produces the impression of standing in a beautiful summertime garden in the height of summer. <br />
<br />
My only regret is its price point, which is surprisingly high given that it was produced with the approval of the current king of the United Kingdom and named after his Gloucestershire estate. (Wouldn't he have wanted to produce something that more of his people could afford to enjoy?) It's not as soft or as feminine as many other linden fragrances, although it's certainly not as bracing as MAB's Tilia, either. It really hits a nice sweet spot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2198851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2198851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185809" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185809" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="faunwand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220622.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="faunwand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clarins/Eau-Ressourcante-2827.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2827.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Ressourcante"title="Eau Ressourcante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185809ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185809" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622">faunwand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 06:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you love yellow florals and prefer something elegant yet simple, this scent is for you. It's classy and perfect for the mature woman who appreciates minimalist beauty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2185809"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2185809#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182387" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LulaValentine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LulaValentine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Miu-Miu/Miu-Miu-Twist-53147.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53147.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miu Miu Twist"title="Miu Miu Twist"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406713">LulaValentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening legitimately triggers flashbacks of walking through one of the big local gardens in my city as a child. Realistic floral and green notes. It smooths down to a dainty and pretty floral that has okay sillage. I go nose blind to this one pretty quickly unfortunately, but I get many compliments and its been perfect for this abhorrent Florida weather!<br />
<br />
Thank you to my Fragrance Fairy Godmother for sending me a bottle of this. If it wasnt for you, Id never have triedmuch less own many of the beautiful fragrances I do now. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2182387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2182387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2169938" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169938" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marta_Regina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1934803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marta_Regina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169938ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169938" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934803">Marta_Regina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 01:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very floral opening, like in a lushly blooming garden on a warm day, pleasant, sweet, elegant. Quite complex, yet I don't sense this fragrance for very long.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2169938"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2169938#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="winonahb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204958"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1204958.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="winonahb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2166679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2166679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204958">winonahb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-24">05/24/24 11:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Linden comes across as the first and strongest note. I love it, but was surprised that the rest just blended into, and seemed to become part of, linden. After an hour, it hasn't changed. If you love the fresh, sweet scent of linden, you'll love this, too.<br />
Three hours later, mimosa stands out more than it did.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2166679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2166679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150225" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2150225" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Made by Kouros"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1395030.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Made by Kouros" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2150225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2150225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395030">Made by Kouros</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-09">05/09/24 00:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wonderful feminine floral, then a whole field full of cut grass. Feels very British. Very classical feel, though not outdated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2150225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2150225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141363" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="onjelbercier"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1725255.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="onjelbercier" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Meliora-18750.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18750.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Meliora"title="Meliora"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725255">onjelbercier</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 13:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This oddly reminds me of Pure Poison to some small degree, just a little sweeter. It's very gentle and I find it to be favorably feminine. It definitely smells like an English garden. Not so much the flowers, more like the hedges, ponds, and beehives. It isn't too dry on the senses. Up close it smells like soap, but at a short distance it can give off a kind of spongecake aroma. Very pleasant and could make for the perfect wedding scent or garden party scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2141363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2141363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115356" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937">Chesf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 11:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The author chose to go minimalism all the way.  Mimosa is at the centre of the stage while musk and lime are competent harmonizers.  It is really resembling jo malone's mimosa &amp; cardomom.  However, that one is thicker, riper and this one is airier, indolic and simpler.  Mimosa &amp; cardamom is a countryside paddy field, whereas highgrove bouquet is a fresh clean white royal garden.   A must-try for mimosa fanatics for sure. <br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2115356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2115356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2095905" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2095905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2095905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 01:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>JUICY YELLOW FLORALS OH my goodness- the sillage is just absolutely extravagant! I tend to sometimes be afraid of wearing florals with my skin since I could smell like an old granny. But this- this is how a rich British Royal would smell like, super juicy and baroquely  posh After an hour- what is mesmerizing is that it turns like a floral vanilla with a hint of creamsicle Super long lasting and I am planning to wear it during the transition from springto summer Absolutely exquisite for a floral!<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
LeoTaurusPisces</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2095905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2095905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046644" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nattythegnat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nattythegnat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585172">nattythegnat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 07:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this fragrance. It's difficult to find a floral that truly smells like flowers. This smells like walking through a field or into a beautiful flower garden. It's incredibly fresh and bright, and wears so well. Most florals are very heavy and this isnt at all. I haven't sprung for a bottle yet as it's so expensive, but I spray some on every time I visit a Penhalligons, and one spray always lasts very strongly all day long, morphing beautifully the whole way. Truly an incredible perfume. One day I will own a bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2046644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2046644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001706" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stalal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/958408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.958408.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stalal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Vodka-on-the-Rocks-23899.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23899.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vodka on the Rocks"title="Vodka on the Rocks"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001706ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001706" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/958408">stalal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-15">12/15/23 02:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought Luna and they gave me sample of this. By the time I got home Luna turned into a sticky oily plasticky smell but this bloomed beautiful as yellow florals.<br />
I so wanted to buy Ginestra by Santa Maria Novella because I wanted a yellow florals but I think it has been discontinued so this turned out to be the perfect substitute. <br />
I went back and exchanged Luna for this! Will do it any day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2001706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2001706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1997472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1997472" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eduardo.nobrega"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="eduardo.nobrega" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1997472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1997472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919641">eduardo.nobrega</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-10">12/10/23 03:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Important to note that the notes involved are more complex than the ones listed here. The Highgrove Gardens official website gives the actual full list:<br />
<br />
With top notes of geranium, lavender and hyacinth, middle notes of weeping lime headspace, French mimosa and tuberose, and base notes of cedar wood, orris fusion and musk, it is a fragrance as natural as it is elegant and warm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1997472"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1997472#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1964572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1964572" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1964572ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1964572" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-30">10/30/23 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is orris in the base notes along with the cedar which is not listed. Although I do not get any mimosa in the opening, it emerges after a few minutes. A beautiful honeyed accord of fuzzy yellow flowers with pollen. I like how someone else described this as a shape-shifting perfume because it truly is. The orris-cedar drydown is quite pleasant and mellow and lasts for hours. Overall a joyous and uplifting scent so I dont understand reviews that say that this is melancholic.<br />
<br />
Edit: I bought this for myself as a unisex scent but my husband is the one who wears it most often!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1964572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1964572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1817463" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1817463" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DiaHaret"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029944"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1029944.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DiaHaret" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legacy of Petra"title="Legacy of Petra"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1817463ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1817463" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029944">DiaHaret</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-25">04/25/23 15:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not fresh at all and not a hint of linden flowers. Very similar to Lilas Persan from Novaya Zarya, slightly more modern maybe, but still a bit musty, leaning towards violets/lilacs rather than yellow flowers, despite these not showing among the notes. I actually prefer Lilas Persan, it has more character, more presence and longevity at a fraction of the cost.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1817463"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1817463#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804879" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1796455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DS9Dax"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396246"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1396246.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DS9Dax" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Carmina-84206.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84206.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carmina"title="Carmina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1796455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1796455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396246">DS9Dax</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-30">03/30/23 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nod to the classic gentlemans scent. It is fresh, herbal.  The first opening is floral but the dissipates quickly then its a soft herbal lavender. The longer it sits is becomes more lavender woody. Has a pop of tartness.<br />
   This is definitely unisex but I can see why many people have scored it on the feminine side as those concepts has changed over the last hundred years. This is not a contemporary masculine spicy scent.<br />
  This is a cultured classy gentleman or gentlewoman.<br />
   It is definitely worth testing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1796455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1796455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1788950" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think this would be a safe blind buy for Mothers day. Ive had one spray on my arm all day and I can still smell it strongly going to bed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1788950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1788950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786731" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nw7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nw7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); Very powdery, like fragrances my grandmother would wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1786731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1786731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1779961" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1779961" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leriver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/233503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.233503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="leriver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/French-Flower-73007.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73007.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Flower"title="French Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1779961ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1779961" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/233503">leriver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-10">03/10/23 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cannot wear floral fragrances, but this doesnt smell like a floral perfume it genuinely smells like an real English garden on a sunny day, very different; greens, trees, the moist air, the warm sun. Hints of green tea, cut grass and cedar neutralises the gender. Comparing floral samples side by side (Penhaligon's, Matiere Premiere, Kilian...), what makes this floral distinctly different is that there is something unique that conveys a feeling of bright light. <br />
<br />
The perfumer used the process of gas chromatography/mass spectrometry molecular analysis to recreate the unique scent of the garden. It's like a recording studio for scents, absolutely fascinating technology. <br />
Unlike most of the Penhaligon's collection, this EDP has endurance, clinging to my skin and evolving to a lovely cedar for over 4 hours-If you are making an EDP for the future King, you better not cheap out.<br />
 <br />
Not only did I buy a full bottle, but my husband and I are planning a trip to the Highgrove estate to walk in the hanging silver lime garden that was recorded to create this masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1779961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1779961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1748902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="malenapo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/49037"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.49037.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="malenapo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Stellar-Times-68356.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68356.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Stellar Times"title="Stellar Times"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1748902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1748902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/49037">malenapo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 07:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Highgrove Bouquet is a very mimosa but old-fashioned fragrance. It could have been made in the 60ties as well. Mimosa - Lime blossom combo strong and natural. Grand grandmother smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1748902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1748902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1651793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1651793" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shelle226"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1576981"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shelle226" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1651793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1651793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1576981">Shelle226</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-24">09/24/22 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this perfume. Beautifully floral and sweet a truly feminine fragrance that brings to mind warm summer days in an English garden. With a gentle summer breeze wafting the scent of the sweet flowers aloft to the gentle hum of the bees.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1651793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1651793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1642371" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; </div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1779961" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1779961" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leriver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/233503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.233503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="leriver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/French-Flower-73007.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73007.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Flower"title="French Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1779961ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1779961" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/233503">leriver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-10">03/10/23 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cannot wear floral fragrances, but this doesnt smell like a floral perfume it genuinely smells like an real English garden on a sunny day, very different; greens, trees, the moist air, the warm sun. Hints of green tea, cut grass and cedar neutralises the gender. Comparing floral samples side by side (Penhaligon's, Matiere Premiere, Kilian...), what makes this floral distinctly different is that there is something unique that conveys a feeling of bright light. <br />
<br />
The perfumer used the process of gas chromatography/mass spectrometry molecular analysis to recreate the unique scent of the garden. It's like a recording studio for scents, absolutely fascinating technology. <br />
Unlike most of the Penhaligon's collection, this EDP has endurance, clinging to my skin and evolving to a lovely cedar for over 4 hours-If you are making an EDP for the future King, you better not cheap out.<br />
 <br />
Not only did I buy a full bottle, but my husband and I are planning a trip to the Highgrove estate to walk in the hanging silver lime garden that was recorded to create this masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1779961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1779961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1997472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1997472" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eduardo.nobrega"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="eduardo.nobrega" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1997472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1997472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919641">eduardo.nobrega</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-10">12/10/23 03:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Important to note that the notes involved are more complex than the ones listed here. The Highgrove Gardens official website gives the actual full list:<br />
<br />
With top notes of geranium, lavender and hyacinth, middle notes of weeping lime headspace, French mimosa and tuberose, and base notes of cedar wood, orris fusion and musk, it is a fragrance as natural as it is elegant and warm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Beautifully floral and sweet a truly feminine fragrance that brings to mind warm summer days in an English garden. With a gentle summer breeze wafting the scent of the sweet flowers aloft to the gentle hum of the bees.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="1651793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=1651793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046644" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nattythegnat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nattythegnat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585172">nattythegnat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 07:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this fragrance. It's difficult to find a floral that truly smells like flowers. This smells like walking through a field or into a beautiful flower garden. It's incredibly fresh and bright, and wears so well. Most florals are very heavy and this isnt at all. I haven't sprung for a bottle yet as it's so expensive, but I spray some on every time I visit a Penhalligons, and one spray always lasts very strongly all day long, morphing beautifully the whole way. Truly an incredible perfume. One day I will own a bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2046644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2046644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198851" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Xeryus-861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Xeryus"title="Xeryus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716">Glyph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 03:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has been one of the finest among the surprising spate of new linden fragrances that have appeared lately, and, with its addition of mimosa, produces the impression of standing in a beautiful summertime garden in the height of summer. <br />
<br />
My only regret is its price point, which is surprisingly high given that it was produced with the approval of the current king of the United Kingdom and named after his Gloucestershire estate. (Wouldn't he have wanted to produce something that more of his people could afford to enjoy?) It's not as soft or as feminine as many other linden fragrances, although it's certainly not as bracing as MAB's Tilia, either. It really hits a nice sweet spot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76125"comment_id="2198851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Highgrove-Bouquet-76125.html?ccid=2198851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76125" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });

</script>
